original_title: Report on plantation enterprise reforms to President
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The committee report compiled regarding plantation enterprise reforms is scheduled to be presented to the President on Thursday (04).
The committee was appointed by the President and is headed by State Minister of Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya.
The State Minister said he hopes to commence the plantation enterprise reform program after submitting the relevant Cabinet paper.
